name: PG&E Corporation
summary: PG&E Corporation is a publicly traded holding company whose primary subsidiary, Pacific Gas and Electric Company, is a regulated utility serving over 5 million electricity customers and 4.6 million gas customers across Central and Northern California. Founded in 1905, PG&E is one of the largest combined natural gas and electric utilities in the United States and is a major private owner of hydroelectric facilities. The company is headquartered in Oakland, California.
